attributes.name: value
attributes.desc: binding value, name of the selected tab

attributes.name: v-model
attributes.desc: binding value, name of the selected tab

attributes.name: editable
attributes.desc: whether Tab is addable and closable

attributes.name: stretch
attributes.desc: whether width of tab automatically fits its container

attributes.name: before-leave
attributes.desc: hook function before switching tab. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, switching will be prevented

events.name: @tab-click
events.desc: triggers when a tab is clicked

events.name: @tab-remove
events.desc: triggers when tab-remove button is clicked

events.name: @tab-add
events.desc: triggers when tab-add button is clicked

events.name: @edit
events.desc: triggers when tab-add button or tab-remove is clicked
